thread.title: BRIEF-Enbridge CEO sees strong interest from potential asset buyers

title: BRIEF-Enbridge CEO sees strong interest from potential asset buyers
text: February 16, 2018 / 3:31 PM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-Enbridge CEO sees strong interest from potential asset buyers Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 16 (Reuters) - Enbridge Inc CEO Al Monaco, speaking on a quarterly conference call: * ENBRIDGE INC CEO SAYS NOTHING TO INDICATE ADDITIONAL ASSET SALES REQUIRED OVER 2018 TARGET, BUT KEEPING OPTIONS OPEN * ENBRIDGE SEEING STRONG INTEREST FROM POTENTIAL BUYERS OF RENEWABLE, MIDSTREAM ASSETS THAT ARE FOR SALE - CEO * ENBRIDGE CEO SAYS HE SEES ‘UNPREDICTABILITY’ ABOUT CANADA PROJECT REGULATORY CHANGES UNTIL LEGISLATION SEEN Further company coverage: (Reporting By Rod Nickel)
